page.title: 06A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MR NASH
page.content: After a breakfast of cereal, egg and toast, I travel about 8 miles to Westlands Helicopter Co.in Yeovil. I clock in by 8.30am. My job as an avionic instalation designer involves the use of computers.It is an interesting job and covers all aspects of design, from wiring diagrams, drawing up cable assemblies and the mechanical design and integration of systems into helicopters.I prepare work for other engineers,supervise it and finally check it. Lunch break is between 1.00pm and 2.00pm when I eat a packed lunch of sandwiches.I leave for home at 5.00pm. Following tea, which is usually a cooked meal of meat and vegetables, I usually work in the garden until dusk.Then I relax in front of the television until bedtime.
